description: ​DeLorme released the first version of Street Atlas USA in 1991. Over the years, DeLorme has updated and enhanced Street Atlas USA, incorporating various features, including GPS navigation and route planning. The software remained popular among travelers, businesses, and mapping enthusiasts until its discontinuation following Garmin's acquisition of DeLorme in 2016.
SAF files saved by Street Atlas USA allowed users to reopen their saved maps with all their preferences and additions intact. The software automatically saved the files in the following directory:
